name: iep-processor
description: AI-powered IEP document extraction and processing

scripts.test:claude4-opus: npm run build && PRIMARY_MODEL=claude tsx src/test-runner-dist.ts
scripts.test:claude4-sonnet: npm run build && PRIMARY_MODEL=claude-sonnet tsx src/test-runner-dist.ts
scripts.test:o4mini: npm run build && PRIMARY_MODEL=o4-mini tsx src/test-runner-dist.ts
scripts.test:compare: npm run test:o4mini && npm run test:claude4-opus
